comparison.description: BetterFleet stands as a performance titan by reducing server search time significantly â€“ displaying a speed 3 to 4 times higher than that of Fleet Creator. When we look at our graph, the green bars, corresponding to BetterFleet, reach inferior values with a consistency that notes a advanced technical optimization. This means that, concretely, BetterFleet locates the game server with remarkable agility, drastically reducing connection delays. Players can thus expedite a near-instant transition to their favorite virtual worlds, thanks to a concise platform for efficiency and speed. BetterFleet is the assurance of an uncompromising performance for an unequal user experience.
comparison.subtitle: A turbocharged connection for triple speed game!
comparison.title: Comparison with Fleet Creator

descriptions.globe: BetterFleet is designed and efficient. With an artistic direction close to Sea of Thieves, you will feel like navigating an extension of the game at the peak of the reactivity.
descriptions.hourglass: Our synchronized auto-click feature implements a perfectly coordinated account between all players in the session ensuring a server search for a fearsome efficiency that minimizes the wait time.
descriptions.key: Our application ensures the security of users thanks to its open source code, allowing full transparency, and a team of active developers dedicated to regular updates and maintenance of the security.

discord.content: Our application has grown well beyond a simple interface because it is anchored in a vibrant, committed community on our dedicated Discord server. This dynamic space is the crossroads where players can not only share their experiences, but also actively contribute to development by submitting ideas for improvement. Open and constructive dialogue is encouraged, forging synergy between users and creators. In addition, our Discord server provides robust support for those who want to integrate our application on their side. Whether for technical advice, strategic orientations or customization tips, our members and our support team are always ready to help, ensuring a transparent and successful integration.
discord.title: Our preferred exchange platform!

github.content: At the heart of our project is a deep commitment to open source, Reflected by our code accessible to all and our team of active and receptive developers. This philosophy guarantees a constant evolution of our application, driven by transparent collaboration and fruitful exchanges with our community. Player feedback is a cornerstone of our development process, as it allows us to fine-tune and improve our offer, by ensuring that it responds precisely to the needs and desires of our users. Openness to suggestions and ability to adapt quickly to our developers ensure that our application remains at the cutting edge, while cultivating a relationship of trust and mutual respect with our committed community.
github.title: Our open source commitment to constantly evolving application

translation.content: Our application embraces diversity and inclusiveness through its i18n based development opening the door to translations in any language by the community itself. This approach ensures that our application can be easily adapted and used by users around the world. reflecting our commitment to breaking language barriers. In addition, we have set up a public Crowdin project, providing an intuitive platform for all those willing to contribute to the translation efforts. This initiative promotes international collaboration, enabling our application to be enriched by the cultural and linguistic nuances of each contributor. Together, we build a truly global, accessible and engaging gaming experience for an ever-expanding international community.
translation.title: Uniting players from all over the world thanks to i18n and Crowdin

faq.description: Have a question about BetterFleet? We answer here the most relevant questions
faq.more: Having trouble or not finding the answer to your problem? Go to our

alliance.content1: BetterFleet helps players find alliances, but does not guarantee instant access to a single server.
alliance.content2: To group several players, many factors come into play and are not controlled by BetterFleet. These include: time, number of players performing search, location, Internet connection, as well as the goodwill of Sea of Thieves matchmaking servers.
alliance.content3: We observe a tendency or the search time varies between 5 minutes for the luckiest and up to 3 hours for the least fortunate. However, these estimates remain approximate and are not guaranteed.
alliance.content4: BetterFleet does not automatically join the same server on an instant basis, but it makes your search easier by optimizing the process.
alliance.title: Does BetterFleet guarantee to join the same server instantly?

bug.content1: If you encounter problems or bugs, we encourage you to report it to us so that we can work on improving your experience. Here's how to contact us:
bug.content2: Discord: Join our Discord server and share your issue in the support channel. Our team is always ready to help you and answer your questions in time.
bug.content3: GitHub: If you are familiar with GitHub, you can also open an issue on our GitHub era. This allows us to track structural problems and ensure transparent and effective monitoring.
bug.content4: We understand your feedback and commit to solving issues in the best of the issues.
bug.title: How do I report a bug or problem?

console.content1: Absolutely! We developed special features to improve the experience of Xbox and PlayStation players. Here's what we've put in place:
console.content2: Sound count: We have incorporated a sound component into the count. This function allows users to know exactly when to raise anchor, without the Alliance Leader having to give voice instructions. This makes the sessions more fluid while addressing the delay caused by online exchange platforms.
console.content3: Platform type visual indication: We added an icon that allows users to know if their teammates are using a console. This feature promotes better coordination and understanding between players of different platforms.
console.content4: These enhancements are concise to make the game experience more intuitive and accessible to console players, ensuring harmonious integration within mixed gaming communities.
console.title: Is there an integer for console players?

data.content1: Confidentiality and security of our users' data are of the utmost importance to us. Here is our policy on user data management:
data.content2: Data usage: Username and email address are the only elements required for application purposes. No other personal data is collected.
data.content3: Security and Encryption: Data collected is encrypted and stored securely to prevent unauthorized access.
data.content4: Cookies and Resell: We do not use any cookies, nor do we sell or share user information with third parties.
data.content5: Anonymous data and statistics: For the continuous improvement of our application, we use anonymous data for statistical purposes. Under no circumstances do these data allow users to be personally identified.
data.content6: We are committed to maintaining transparency and respecting the privacy of our users in all circumstances.
data.title: What do I do with user data?

download.content3: Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation.
download.content4: That's it! BetterFleet will be installed on your device.
download.title: How to install BetterFleet?

eac.content1: BetterFleet is closer to a logbook than anything else. Its main automatic function simulates a single mouse click, just like a voice command, and does not constitute a macro in itself. Systems such as Easy Anti-Cheat (EAC) focus mainly on RAM manipulation and therefore have no reason to condemn our method.
eac.content2: Also, click is never executed in-game and only occurs in menus, compliant with the conditions of use of Sea of Thieves and Xbox. These conditions are broad in order to legally cover as many situations as possible, but there is no mention of our specific use. The option is however deactivable at the user's wish.
eac.content3: It remains essential to understand that using tools such as BetterFleet and Fleet Creator is not entirely risky, especially regarding IP detection, which remains a sensitive point. Our application is as supreme as another, but not recognized by Rare or Microsoft, we are fully dependent on their will to act.
eac.title: Are there any risks with Easy Anti-Cheat? (EAC)

edge.content1: If you have problems running the application or if it crashes after a proper installation, please follow these troubleshooting steps:
edge.content2: Make sure your operating system is Windows 10 or Windows 11.
edge.content3: Make sure Microsoft Edge and Microsoft Edge WebView2 are installed correctly on your machine. These components are essential for the proper functioning of the application.
edge.content4: There may be a conflict with your antivirus, if permitted, exclude BetterFleet from the list of threats presented. Otherwise, disable your antivirus and restart the application.
edge.content5: If the problem persists, try to reinstall the app to fix any potential corruption.
edge.content6: If after these steps the app still doesn't work, please do not contact us on our Discord server for more personalized support.
edge.title: Why does my application crash and/or not launch?

password.content1: If you forget your password, the app does not automatically recover it. You can contact us on our Discord, and we can reset it for you. However, we recommend that you create a new account, unless you really want to recover the old one.
password.content2: The app has a "Forgot password" feature, but we do not yet have the necessary infrastructure to enable it. You can contribute to the project or donate via our GitHub page to help us set it up.
password.title: What should I do if I forget my password?

security.content1: Yes, our application is consistent with user security as the absolute priority. Here are the measures we have put in place to ensure greater use:
security.content2: Strengthened authentication: We have integrated an authentication overlay to strengthen the security of user accounts.
security.content3: Open source: The application is completely open source, offering total transparency about its use and operation. This allows the community to verify and audit our code, strengthening confidence in our product.
security.content4: Proactive Maintenance: Our developers are committed to maintaining the application in optimal security conditions. This includes updated dependencies and ongoing monitoring of potential security vulnerabilities to prevent risk.
security.content5: Independent approach: BetterFleet is not licensed under Microsoft and is subject to Windows Defender during installation. Our application is still secure, and we aim to adapt to these constraints which we do not have control.
security.content6: These joint efforts contribute to a reliable and secure platform for all our users.
security.title: Is the app secured?

update.content1: When an update is available, a pop-up window will appear when BetterFleet is launched. You only have to click "Yes" to start the update. The app will automatically install the latest version and restart once the update is complete.
update.content2: In the case of an update is available while BetterFleet is already launched, you can simply close the application. The update will be offered for the next launch.
update.title: How to update BetterFleet?

faq.title: Most Freest Questions

footer.content: Join our global adventure - your passion, our technology. Together, let's transform the game. Powered by community and open innovation.
footer.discord: Having trouble? Contact our team on our
footer.github: Are you a developer and love sailing on Sea of Thieves? Then come and contribute to the project!

warning.content: BetterFleet is an unofficial third-party application unrelated to the Sea of Thieves Development Team. Its use is external and does not affect the experience in any way!
warning.title: Warning

header.details: BetterFleet has officially been released! Test the app now!

presentation.content: Dive into the world of Sea of Thieves with the ultimate tool to forge alliances like never before. Our app is changing how players log in, offering exceptional fluidity and significantly increasing your chances of finding an alliance, far beyond the capabilities of other applications. Join our community and transform your gaming experience into an epic adventure, or create links and navigate together becomes a reference accessible with each click.
presentation.title: BetterFleet

end.content: Good wind! May you sail in honor of sailors and make a fortune at sea! But. - Beware of the mutins, they envy the fresh fragrance of the new riches!
end.title: Once the server is found?

howTo.content: In order to create an alliance in Sea of Thieves, players must coordinate their actions accurately. The organization starts well before taking the sea, at an agreed moment by all participants. The key is to synchronize in the game menus at the given moment or each click on the "Anchor raise" button, This potentially allows the different crews to find themselves on the same server. This is where BetterFleet enters the seal. In order to facilitate this synchronization, the app offers an interface over which players can plan their actions in a coordinated manner.
howTo.title: How to create an alliance?

1.content: First you will need an account. By opening BetterFleet you will be asked to log in with your credentials in order to access the application.
1.title: Connecting to Application

2.content: Select the 'Create Session' option to set up a new space where you can invite other players to join your alliance.
2.title: Create Session

3.content: A unique code will be managed for your session. Give this code to the people you want to invite to join the alliance.
3.title: Session Code Sharing

4.content: Ask all players to go to the 'Raise Anchor' menu of the game, or they will be able to prepare to start the game together.
4.title: Gathering in the 'Rising Anchor Menu'

5.content: Each player then has to change their status for the start, and what they can do by selecting the Preview option in the application interface.
5.title: Confirm Everyone is Precious

6.content: Once all players are ready, the Mayor of the session initiates a countdown on BetterFleet to coordinate the simultaneity of the click on 'raise the Anchor'.
6.title: Countdown Launch

7.content: Once in play, you have to check if you found a common server. BetterFleet will list players who are together. If you did not find a server, repeat the process from step 4 and so on.
7.title: Check Server Meme Presence

whatIsIt.content: An alliance server is a game server or several teams have agreed to form a strategic alliance by combining for their mutual benefit. On these servers, players share the same goals, such as the collection of treasures, or the completeness of queens, and agree not to attack each other. The idea is for each member to benefit from the rewards, optimizing the winnings and the gaming experience of all. This creates an environment where players can focus on teamwork and exploration rather than on competency, offering a more extensive community adventure.
whatIsIt.title: What is an alliance server on Sea of Thieves?
